title: AI Policies Partial
description: Schema for policy partial frontmatter in Markdown files

id.description: Unique identifier for this partial within its package

weight.description: Ordering weight within the layer (lower weights come first)

protected.description: Whether this partial's content is protected from being overridden

dependsOn.description: List of partial IDs that this partial depends on

owner.description: Team or individual responsible for maintaining this partial

tags.description: Optional tags for categorizing and filtering partials

providers.description: IDE providers this partial applies to (if not specified, applies to all)

version.description: Version when this partial was last modified

description.description: Human-readable description of what this partial does
